item.title: Delicious Webapp Hacking
item.author: mubix
item.description: [UPDATE] This module (enum_delicious) has been pulled from Metasploit since Delicious no longer allows searching by site. In the last post I showed off how Archive.org’s Wayback machine can be used to pull urls for a domain, another place where URLs are stored and can be searched by domain is Delicious.com (a bookmarking service). I’ve seen people bookmark everything from internal web portals to urls with special no-auth passwords in them.
